exclusion.criterion: Congenital anomalies or recognizable malformation syndromes
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Mother's self-reported use of illicit drugs or alcohol during pregnancy;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Birth weight <3rd %tile (small for gestational age, SGA) according to gestational age
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious neurological problems including active seizure disorder (afebrile seizure within the last year) and/or anticonvulsant medication use, history of a central nervous system infections, or ventriculoperitoneal shunt for treatment for hydrocephalus
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: IQ < 70 on the testing of this study because we would expect language delays in this group;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Sensori-neural hearing loss, defined as 4-tone pure-tone average > 25 decibels as assessed at any time because hearing loss compromises language and reading development;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Visual impairments that would interfere with the ability to read;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old farmer diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. He experiences slowness of movement and tremors, but his medications help with shaking and slow movement.
